name: @slicekit/erc8128-cli
description: CLI tool for signing HTTP requests with ERC-8128 (Ethereum HTTP signatures)

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --target=node --outdir=./dist --format=esm --minify --sourcemap && { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat ./dist/index.js; } > ./dist/index.tmp && mv ./dist/index.tmp ./dist/index.js && chmod +x ./dist/index.js

author: slice-so
